mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.mmp_id AS "mmpId", a.work_person_id AS "workPersonId", a.submit_state AS "submitState", a.part AS "part", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", mmp.id AS "mmp.id", wp.id AS "wp.id", wp.name AS "wp.name"
LEFT JOIN mask_main_person mmp ON mmp.id = a.mmp_id LEFT JOIN work_person wp ON wp.id = a.work_person_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mask_single_person( id, mmp_id, work_person_id, submit_state, part, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{mmpId}, #{workPersonId}, #{submitState}, #{part}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mask_single_person SET mmp_id = #{mmpId}, work_person_id = #{workPersonId}, submit_state = #{submitState}, part = #{part}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
